# minio_s3_bucket_versioning (Resource)



## Example Usage

```terraform
# Enable versioning on a bucket
resource "minio_s3_bucket_versioning" "example" {
  bucket = "my-bucket"

  versioning_configuration {
    status = "Enabled"
  }
}
```

<!-- schema generated by tfplugindocs -->
## Schema

### Required

- `bucket` (String) Name of the bucket
- `versioning_configuration` (Block List, Min: 1, Max: 1) (see [below for nested schema](#nestedblock--versioning_configuration))

### Read-Only

- `id` (String) The ID of this resource.

<a id="nestedblock--versioning_configuration"></a>
### Nested Schema for `versioning_configuration`

Required:

- `status` (String)

Optional:

- `exclude_folders` (Boolean)
- `excluded_prefixes` (List of String)

## Import

Import is supported using the following syntax:

```shell
# S3 bucket versioning configurations can be imported using the bucket name
terraform import minio_s3_bucket_versioning.example bucket-name
```
